DOC.brief_summary: Patellofemoral pain syndrome one common musculoskeletal disorder . It define anterior knee pain . Its origin conflict patellar tracking , due patellofemoral malalignment soft tissue overload . A recent study seem show benefit prefabricated foot orthoses patellofemoral pain syndrome , alone association rehabilitation . However , one analyze outcome morpho-specific foot orthoses prospective randomize study . The purpose prospective randomize study compare clinical outcome daily live sport activity , morpho-specific placebo foot orthoses . Morpho-specific foot orthoses design accord patient 's morphotype . They intend correct structural defect hindfoot , midfoot forefoot , aim correct abnormal overload patellofemoral tracking .
DOC.brief_title: Foot Orthoses Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome : Prospective Randomized Study Morpho-specific Versus Placebo Orthoses
